hero.title: PolarDrive is the first fiscal tool based on hourly data collected via the Vehicle Fleet API. It automates, archives, and certifies the exclusive business use of your company car.
hero.subtitle: Traceable innovation.
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At DataPolar, we believe every company should have access to clear, traceable, and automated fiscal tools. We aim to simplify what is complicated.
mission.paragraph2: PolarDrive was born from a real need: proving the business use of a car with objective data. No borderline strategies â€” just transparency, security, and automation.
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Letâ€™s discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.
contact.label.name: Name
contact.placeholder.name: Your name

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Tech solutions for future-oriented companies.
products.polardrive.description: Certify the business use of your Vehicle. 100% deductible. 100% defensible.
polardrive.title: PolarDrive
polardrive.subtitle: The ultimate solution for 100% tax deductibility of your business Vehicle.
polardrive.benefits.title: Tax Benefits
polardrive.benefits.item2: No fiscal risk or ambiguous interpretations
polardrive.features.title: Technical Features
polardrive.features.item1: Hourly data collection via Vehicle Fleet API
polardrive.features.item3: Local AI component for visual summaries
polardrive.CTA: Find out how to activate PolarDrive

admin.mainWorkflow.button.generateMonthl: This action will generate PDF reports for all active clients for the previous month. The operation may take some time. Are you sure you want to proceed?
admin.mainWorkflow.alerts.urlGenerationC: Authorization URL copied to clipboard. Send it to the client (CTRL+V)
Are you sure you want to set this vehicle's status to NotActive? Please ensure that the signed consents, from the specific company, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm

Vehicle status is currently set to NotActive, but data acquisition (Fetching) is still active. Reactivating the Active status will not affect the data acquisition state. Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm
It is not allowed to set a Vehicle to NotFetching (disable data acquisition) while it is in Active status

Vehicle status has been verified as NotActive. Do you authorize setting the status to NotFetching (disable data acquisition) for this Vehicle? Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm

Vehicle status has been verified as NotFetching. Are you sure you want to set the status to Fetching (enable data acquisition)? Please ensure that the signed consents, in .zip format, has been uploaded before proceeding. Press OK to confirm
